description: Find agent skills to EXECUTE by hybrid search (lexical + semantic with RRF). Use ONLY when you need to find a skill to run for solving a business problem. Returns skill metadata for loading skill files. DO NOT use for analytics, counts, histograms, or aggregations on the agent_skills index - use platform.core.generate_esql instead.

configuration.query:
FROM agent_skills METADATA _score, _id, _index 
| EVAL tags_str = MV_CONCAT(tags, ",") 
| WHERE tags_str RLIKE ?tag 
| FORK (WHERE MATCH(name, ?query) OR MATCH(description, ?query) OR MATCH(short_description, ?query) OR MATCH(examples, ?query) | SORT _score DESC | LIMIT 100) (WHERE MATCH(semantic_content, ?query) | SORT _score DESC | LIMIT 100) 
| FUSE 
| SORT _score DESC 
| LIMIT ?limit 
| KEEP skill_id, name, domain, tags, short_description, rating, author, version

query.description: Natural language search query to find relevant skills

tag.description: Regex pattern to filter by tags (e.g., '.*finance.*', '.*compliance.*'). Use '.*' to match all tags.

limit.description: Maximum number of skills to return (default: 5)
